note.p: Education: Abingdon School; Pembroke College, Oxford. DD (by diploma)
Career: Fellow, Exeter College, Oxford; Chaplain to the English factory, St Petersburg; Canon and Prebendary, Salisbury; Prebendary, Wells
Memberships: Academy of Sciences, St Petersburg
References: John H Appleby, 'Daniel Dumaresq, DD, FRS (1712-1805) as a Promoter of Anglo-Russian Science and Culture' in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 25-50, plate
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
